section.p: and are available as a pre-configured appliance, in OVA or ISO format. The majority of the installation process is complete, including Docker image downloads. supports installing the OVA package on VMware vSphere systems, and installing the ISO package on Microsoft Hyper-V systems.

The appliance may be configured as a master host or as a resource pool host. An automated setup process configures an appliance's role in a cluster, and a curses-based administration menu simplifies common maintenance procedures.

The is available for download by all; no special permissions are required. For more information, refer to the .
section.p: The appliance file is about 2.5GB in size, and expands to about 5GB when installed. The appliance specifies one 334GB disk with several LVM volumes. The volumes may be expanded, but never shrunk. The hypervisor storage for the appliance may be a thin-provisioned volume.
